title: Marboo - Managing markup language files such as Markdown, RST(reStructured Text) and Org-mode, Support Sphinx/Jekyll/Octopress, Writing and previewing Notes, Edit with external editor , written by @amoblin, MAS download link: http://t.cn/RPcyGVw #Marboo#
description: Marboo是Mac下管理Markdown文件的利器，支持导入Markdown文件夹。支持Markdown、rST(reStructured Text)、Textile、txt2tag等格式的笔记和文件管理。 支持设置编辑器，比如Emacs、Vim、Atom、Sublime Text等，无缝整合静态博客系统如Sphinx/Jekyll/Octopress等。 Markdown文件支持Latex格式公式、表格、代码高亮显示，支持用remark.js格式制作幻灯片。 支持VexTab格式来制作五线谱。
keywords: Markdown, RST, Org-mode, Sphinx, Jekyll, Octopress, Hexo, Emacs, Mou, MacVim, reStructuredText, Note, Preview, Reader, Viewer
subSlogon: The Professional Markup Language File Previewer.
downloadDesc: Free Download on the Mac App Store

coreInfo.title: Custom File Editor Supported
coreInfo.subtitle: Support All Text Editor, such as Mou / Vim / Emacs / Atom / Sublime Text, etc.

coreInfo.title: Preview Immediately
coreInfo.subtitle: Once saved in editor, Marboo will update the preview immediately.

features.title: markup languages supported
features.info: popular markup langues are supported，such as Markdown、reStructured Text、Org-mode、Textile、txt2tag, etc.

features.title: file editors supported
features.info: all kinds of file editors are supported，such as Vim、Emacs、Atom、Sublime Text、Textmate、Mou、Ulysses, etc.

features.title: Preview in real time
features.info: once file saved，the preview will update immediately.

features.title: Terminal supported
features.info: responsibility for Terminal command，such as create, delete, modified for file and folder.

features.title: Syntax Highlight for code file
features.info: all code file can show syntax highlight by Pygments.

features.title: Document Systems supported(only supported in Pro version)
features.info: document systems are supported such as GitBook、Sphinx、Jekyll、Octopress、Hexo、Ghost, etc.

features.title: Share note in local network
features.info: URL link or QRCode can be genereated for note preview page, which can share to friends in local network.

features.title: Security
features.info: All files are stored in local file system.
